availability_constraints: Single point of failure for all infrastructure work.
risk_mitigation: CRITICAL RISK: Resource is over-allocated by 44% in early sprints. Requires immediate re-planning or contractor support.
alternative_allocation: Offload CI/CD setup to a backend developer to reduce load.

availability_constraints: Lead on all critical backend features.
skill_development_goals: Deepen knowledge of asynchronous patterns in Python.
risk_mitigation: Pair programming with odoo.dev2 on complex tasks like E-Invoicing.
alternative_allocation: Can absorb some DevOps tasks if SRE is overloaded.

skill_development_goals: Gain proficiency in FastAPI and event-driven architecture.
risk_mitigation: Allocate dedicated time for FastAPI training and pair with SRE for microservice deployment.
alternative_allocation: Can focus on standard Odoo features while Lead handles complex integrations.

availability_constraints: Starts in Sprint 3. Single point of failure for all frontend work.
risk_mitigation: Start with well-defined component prototypes early; maintain a component library.
alternative_allocation: Can assist with QA testing on UI/UX heavy features.

availability_constraints: Over-allocated in Sprint 1. Testing is a bottleneck.
risk_mitigation: HIGH RISK: Capacity is at 100% with no buffer. Developers must assist with writing integration tests. Prioritize test automation.
alternative_allocation: Focus only on manual E2E testing for early sprints, deferring automation.
